name: Dirt Shift Racer
description:
Dirt Shift Racer : DSR is very addictive and exciting racing game which provides realistic driving simulation experience. It's desert racing environment and graphics are amazing and ideal for the lovers of drag car racing and fans of car driving simulators.

Bang the race with the opponents and win the chance of unlocking the power of new cars, thrill and upgrades for the top class cars of the world. More races and more experience will result in more fruitful coins to UNLOCK the Thrills of this additive game.

Burn the fuel to achieve the highest score in the Leaderboard and challange your Friends to compete with you. Enjoy the thrill of desert environment of the Dirt Shift Racer : DSR!

KEY FEATURES:

• Desert Environment
• Amazing and Stunning 3D Graphics
• Realistic and Smooth Driving Experience
• Amazing Game Play
• Precise Gear Shifting
• Upgrade able Engine and Components
• Leader-Board and Achievements

How To Play

1. Press the Launch button when all the signal lights turn Green
2. Press the Shift Gear button when the indicator light goes to green.
